description.message: UnDistro is a Getup.io backed initiative to create products that help you manage your Kubernetes environment in a simple and centralized way.

heading.message:
Get to know your Kubernetes 
clusters inside out

zora.title.message: The first product launched by Undistro is Zora.

zora.description.message: Zora scans all of your Kubernetes clusters periodically, searching for potential issues or vulnerabilities in deployed resources and configurations, helping to make sure you are in compliance with best practices and also to avoid problems regarding security, allocation, and misconfiguration.

zora.features.items.0.description.message: Zora brings a centralized visualization of all your clusters, with the most relevant data and number of issues

zora.features.items.1.description.message: Zora shows you several details of the issue: category, severity, and all resources affected. With this data, you can analyze the exact component that needs to be fixed.

zora.features.items.2.title.message: Centralized visualization of all the issues

zora.features.items.2.description.message: You can also view all your issues in a single list, without having to select each cluster. This enables you to prioritize the resolution of issues by looking at parameters like: severity, total number of clusters, and environments affected.

zora.features.items.3.description.message: If you don’t know why an issue is in fact a problem for your cluster, we present reliable documentation that will help you understand the root of the problem.

timeline.items.0.description.1.message: We’re pleased to announce the first Alpha version of Zora. It is a working product, but still missing a few features. Everyone can test it out via our

timeline.items.1.description.message: To help you to solve your clusters issues, we are creating a orientation guide that will help you in solving them and to avoid bigger problems in your environment.

timeline.items.2.description.message: Possibility to edit existing issues (enable and disable them, edit criticality, category), allowing you to customize their dashboard according to what is most relevant for your environment.

timeline.items.3.description.3.message: as our only source of vulnerabilities, but we are creating a “Zora” plugin (through Zora syntax), with our own verifications, always up to date with the latest known Kubernetes vulnerabilities.

timeline.items.4.description.message: Possibility to create your own customized checks, via the Zora syntax.

timeline.items.5.description.message: Connect a cluster, edit setting, create a new issue or edit an existing one directly via interface. Let your not-so-technical colleagues join the party with our friendly and intuitive interface.

timeline.items.6.description.message: Possibility to filter issues that only affect a specific namespace

timeline.items.7.description.message: A new version with access control. You’ll be able to share the same dashboard with other people within your team

timeline.items.8.description.message: Integration with Grafana and Prometheus for exporting metrics, and visualizing data in a personalized and editable way

timeline.items.9.description.message:
At that time, we will be ready to release a beta version that will include all the previous features. 
After that, the sky's the limit! We’ll evolve our product with full focus on the user and on delivering the best solution to ensure that your clusters are always in compliance with the best practices.

alpha.title.message: Ready to know your Kubernetes clusters inside out?

alpha.description.message: Join us and give our alpha version a go. Zora is creating the best tool to ensure that your Kubernetes clusters are following the best practices, and we’d love to have you along on this journey!

newsletter.description.message: Stay up to date with the latest developments and releases by signing up to our newsletter.

footer.copyright.message: Undistro is an initiative to create Kubernetes products, backed by

contact.line1.message: Thanks for reaching out to us!

contact.line2.message: If you have any question, or simply want to get in touch with us, feel free to fill this form out.

contact.line3.message: We'll try to get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.line4.message: If you just want to stay up to date with our product, we recommend that you sign up for our

cookies.title.description: The first title of the Cookies page

cookies.subTitle.description: The first subTitle of the Cookies page

cookies.description.item.1.message: Cookies are files or information that may be stored on your devices when you visit web channels or use online services. Most Internet browsers accept cookies; however, users can configure their browsers to refuse certain types of cookies or specific cookies.

cookies.description.item.2.message: In addition, users can delete cookies at any time.

cookies.description.item.3.message: We allow you to control and disable cookies that are non-essential, although cookies are used by us to learn how users interact with our content, and also to improve your experience while visiting our websites.

cookies.description.item.4.message: To understand better, in a list below some of the basic cookies used on our websites are presented, though not limited only to these:

cookies.list.description.1.message: These are temporary cookies that we use to store information regarding the parts of our site you visit during the course of your visit. They expire when you close your browser.

cookies.list.description.2.message: These are necessary for the Site’s operation. We may use essential cookies to identify users, prevent fraudulent use of user accounts, and/or provide features for protection and interaction on the Site.

cookies.list.description.3.message: We use these to recognize when you return to the site. This allows us to personalize our content for you, greet you by name, and remember your preferences (e.g. your choice of language or region).

cookies.list.description.4.message: Records your visit to the website, the pages you’ve visited, and the links you’ve followed. This information is used by us to make the website more relevant to your interests and do statistical evaluation regarding interest and quality of our content.

cookies.question.message: How do I reject or delete Cookies?

cookies.question.description.1.message: You may choose to reject or block all or specific types of cookies during your navigation, by clicking “cookie preferences” on our website(s). You can also modify your preferences by changing your browser settings. Please note though that most browsers do automatically accept cookies. Therefore, if you do not want cookies to be used, you may have to actively delete or block cookies.

cookies.question.description.2.message: If you reject the use of all cookies, you will still be able to visit our websites, but some functions may not work properly.

privacy.subTitle.message: What data do me collect from our users?

privacy.description.message: In order to provide the best service and maintain a good relationship, we must collect some personal information from you. We may collect data you provide directly to us, from third parties, or data which is collected automatically, depending on which service is provided. Below are some of the ways that we collect personal data:

privacy.table.C2L2.message: Name; address; telephone; nationality; gender; email; ID; CPF / SSN; birthdate;

privacy.table.C2L4.message: Name; ID; CPF; CTPS; Voter registration; Telephone; Email; address, certifications, and Board records; birthdate; Name/date of birth/profession; Father, Mother, Spouse;

privacy.table.C2L5.message: Name; ID; CPF; CTPS; Voter registration; ethnicity; Telephone; Email; address, certifications, and Board records; birthdate; Name/date of birth/profession; Father, Mother, Spouse;

privacy.list.title.1.message: Personal data provided directly by you:

privacy.list.description.1.message: Personal data entered or forwarded by you while accessing one of our channels (websites or apps).

privacy.list.title.2.message: Personal data provided by third parties:

privacy.list.description.2.message: It is possible that we may collect: information from public databases, made available by authorities (such as the Federal Internal Revenue Service), by third parties, or even data which you have made public on websites or social networks, at all times respecting your privacy and in accordance with your expectations.

privacy.list.description.3.message: Information may also be collected automatically, such as: characteristics of the device you have used to access, data from browsers, IP (including date and time), origin of IP, information regarding clicks, pages accessed, terms used to search which are typed into our portals, among others. For such collection, we may use standard technologies, such as cookies, pixel tags, beacons, and local shared objects, in order to improve your browsing experience while utilizing our services, in accordance with your habits and preferences.

privacy.list.description.4.message: We and our partner may indirectly perform image and video capture through recordings and dissemination of images related to the course. In the case that we need to collect additional personal data, we take care to obtain your consent to do such or advise you of this action. Any authorization we obtain from you will be accompanied by a commensurate degree of information so that you understand clearly what we will do with this data. You will be informed of any use of personal data collected, and it will only be used for the purposes we inform you of.

privacy.list.description.5.message: We do not generally collect any sensitive personal data; information such as your religious or philosophical beliefs, racial or ethnic origin, health or medical information (except in response to an accommodation request for an event), genetic or biometric data, bank account information (except for the purpose of processing your order), or other similar confidential personal data as defined by the applicable laws. If we need to collect any sensitive personal data from you, we will obtain your consent to the collection of such personal data as required by applicable laws.

privacy.list.description.6.message: With regard to the processing of personal data carried out by us, this will be based, as is applicable to each case, on the following legal hypotheses: for the execution of a contract or preliminary measures; in order to comply with legal or regulatory obligations; in the exercise and defense of the companie ( Getup) rights and interests; or based on a legitimate interest of, always considering and respecting the fundamental rights and guarantees, guaranteed to the owner of the data.

privacy.list.description.7.message: Getup, in providing Services and making its Site available, will act as processor in relation to Personal Data, regardless of whether the data is common or sensitive.

privacy.list.description.8.message: The User expressly consents to the collection, use, storage, and processing of Personal Data and provision to third parties, when such sharing is necessary for the development of Services, under the terms of this Clause and other applicable privacy policies, as in reference to article 7 of Law No. 12,965, of April 23, 2014 (Marco Civil da Internet), and without prejudice to consent and other legal bases for data processing provided for in Brazilian General Data Protection Law -LGPD.
